titles: To the Right Honourable the Lord Mayor, aldermen, and commons, of the City of London, in common-councell assembled. The humble petition of divers citizens of London, who earnestly desire the peace and happinesse of the Parliament, City and kingdome.
publisher: Printed for George Whittington, at the Blew Anchor in Cornhill, neer the Royall Exchange,
notes: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: Great Britain --  History --  Civil War, 1642-1649 --  Early works to 1800.
